Test

Class Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • Test.Chromosome

  • public class Chromosome
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to create instances of chromosomes to solve a Line Balancing Problem
    Author:
    Ulises Martinez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) long computationalTime
      A long variable that stores the time it took to computate the chromosome
      (package private) double cycleTime
      A double variable containing the problem's cycle time
      (package private) int generation
      An int variable that stores the chromosome's generation
      private java.util.Random generator
      A Random variable used to create random results
      (package private) boolean isChild
      A boolean variable that stores whether the chromosome is a child of last generation's chromosomes or not
      (package private) boolean isMutation
      A boolean variable that stores whether the chromosome is a mutation of last generation's chromosome or not
      (package private) boolean isPreserved
      A boolean variable that stores whether the chromosome is preserved from the last generation or not
      (package private) double smoothness
      A double variable that stores the chromosome's smoothness value
      (package private) java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> solved
      A List containing the tasks assigned to each workstation
      (package private) long startTime
      A long variable that stores the time at which the chromosome began its computation
      protected int[] taskIndex
      An int array containing a numerical index for each task in the chromosome
      protected Task[] tasks
      An array containing the chromosome's tasks
      (package private) java.lang.String[] toTable
      A String array containing the chromosome's coded solution
      (package private) java.util.List<java.lang.Double> WSTimes
      A List that stores the work time of each workstation

        void setChromosomes(int[] population)
        Setter method that initializes the chromosome's tasks using the values of tasks in the order given by the values of the population parameter
        Parameters:

      • initialPopulation

        int[] initialPopulation(long STime)
        A method to initialize a chromosome respecting its task precedences
        Parameters:
        STime - - The starting time from which to calculate the task's computational time
        Returns:
        - An int array containing the chromosome's population

        Deprecated. - replaced by initialPopulation(long)

        Parameters:

        Chromosome crossOver(Chromosome parent,
                     double probability,
                     long STime,
                     int gen)
        A method to cross the chromosome with another to create a child
        Parameters:
        parent - - The chromosome with which the cross-over is realized
        probability - - A double value that represents the experiment's confidence level
        STime - - A long value representing the time at which computation began
        gen - - The numeric value that identifies the chromosome's generation
        Returns:
        - The child chromosome produced by the cross-over
